text: Kangaroo Jack is an 2003 American-Australian adventure comedy movie set in New York City and Australia. It was produced by Jerry Bruckheimer and was directed by David McNally. Kangaroo Jack was released on January 17, 2003 in North America. The movie received negative reviews with a 8% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 16 out of 100 from Metacritic. == Cast == *Jerry O'Connell as Charlie Carbone *Anthony Anderson as Louis Booker *Estella Warren as Jessie *Michael Shannon as Frankie Lombardo *Christopher Walken as Salvatore "Sal" Maggio *Dyan Cannon as Anna Carbone *Marton Csokas as Mr. Smith *Bill Hunter as Blue *Tony Nikolakopoulos as Sal's Capo *David Ngoombujarra as James "Mr. Jimmy" Inkamala *Adam Garcia as Kangaroo "Jackie Legs" Jack (voice) (he was uncredited) == Other websites == * * Category:2003 comedy movies Category:2003 adventure movies Category:2000s family movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American family movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Australian movies Category:Australian adventure movies Category:Australian comedy movies Category:Australian family movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies about animals Category:South Australia
title: Kangaroo Jack
